short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter the blocky universe of Minecraft with a captivating wallpaper that transforms your Chrome new tab into a pixelated adventure.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Minecraft Live Wallpaper brings the creativity and exploration of the game to life, showcasing stunning landscapes and iconic characters. Every new tab immerses you in a world of endless possibilities, inspiring your imagination as you build and explore.

Features:
Minecraft Live Wallpaper
Google search bar
Addable and removable shortcuts
Date and time display

This Chrome extension combines a vibrant chrome wallpaper with essential features for an enhanced browsing experience. As one of the best chrome live wallpapers, it adds a fun twist to your chrome background while maintaining functionality.

For more exciting live wallpapers, explore Gameograf.com. Discover extensions like: Creeper Live Wallpaper, Steve Live Wallpaper, Alex Live Wallpaper, Enderman Live Wallpaper, Zombie Live Wallpaper.
